definition: credit system/grading system (in schools, universities etc)

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: The second part is the about the design on moral credit system.
sentences.chinese: 论文的第三部分是德育学分制的实施。

sentences.english: The credit system is a better teaching management system in higher education.
sentences.chinese: 学分制是一种比较先进的高等教育教学管理制度。

sentences.english: I uphold him in his policy of adopting the credit system in our college.
sentences.chinese: 我拥护他在我们大学采用学分制的政策。

sentences.english: The credit system in Americawas first bought by Harvard University in 1872.
sentences.chinese: 美国的学分制是1872年首先在哈佛大学实践的。

sentences.english: The tutorial system is an effective guarantee to implement credit system.
sentences.chinese: 导师制是学分制实施的有效保障。

sentences.english: The credit system in America was first adopted by Harvard University in 1872.
sentences.chinese: 美国的学分制是1872年在哈佛大学首先实施的。

sentences.english: Credits system is an advanced teaching administration system. The essence of credits system is "the system of elective course".
sentences.chinese: 学分制是一种先进的教学管理制度，其核心是选课制。

sentences.english: PCCC is the first one to launch the credit system among institutions of higher education in China.
sentences.chinese: 教育改革篇在全国高校中率先推出先进的完全学分制。

sentences.english: PCCC is the first one to launch the credit system among institutions of higher education in China.
sentences.chinese: 在全国高校中率先推出先进的完全学分制。

sentences.english: It makes a suggestion about the laboratory management under the credit system.
sentences.chinese: 并对学分制下实验室管理提出一些建议。

sentences.english: Advance with times and carry out all-roundly the academic credit system to construct the platform for fostering innovative personnel;
sentences.chinese: 与时俱进，全面推行学分制，搭建创新人才培养平台。

definition: general course/general education course/core course/general curriculum/general education curriculum/core curriculum
(at a school) to take as an elective/an elective/elective (subject)
